attributes.action: Make University lectures start at 10am minimum on a Monday instead of 9am
attributes.additional_details: As it allowed student to wake up and feel ready to learn instead of going into class all tired and not able to pay attention.
attributes.background: Make it university’s are not allowed to start any lecture until 10am on a Monday so everyone has time to wake up.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about the timing of university lectures are a matter for individual universities, not the UK Government or Parliament.
